responses: 0: No, there are policy areas in which the lower (or unicameral) chamber cannot introduce
citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
notes: Converted from (B) to (A) coding. V-Dem Country Coordinators answers were used for country-years where data was missing in CCP (Elkins et al. 2012).
question: By law, does the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature have the ability to introduce bills in all policy jurisdictions?
